data.system_settings: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS, Asus Netbook F551C, Intel Core i3 64bits
data.actual_result: The whole category is gone, despite having permission to view the category.
data.expected_result: The muted channels disappear and the category should be now empty
data.short_description: After pressing "Hide muted channels", categories that contains only muted channels will vanish completely.
data.steps_to_repro: - Be in a server where you don't have create channels permission (the + button next to category names mustn't be there) - Pick any category in this server containing only text channels (no voice)  - Mute all channels in this category.  - Go to server menu and click "Hide muted channels"
